casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Howard, Appellant, v. Ferreri, Judge, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Howard v. Ferreri (1994), 70 Ohio St.3d 587.]

(No. 94-516 Submitted July 27, 1994 Decided October 19, 1994.) Michael D. Slodov, for appellant. Stephanie Tubbs Jones, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Carol Shockley, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
